css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0ccee1ec-u{min-width:100%;padding-top:150px;padding-bottom:0px;flex-direction:column;row-gap:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0ccee1ec-u > .maxi-background-displayer .maxi-background-displayer__1{width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-1,0,0,0),1);display:block;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0ccee1ec-u{padding-top:200px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0ccee1ec-u{padding-top:60px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #container-maxi-0ccee1ec-u{padding-top:40px;}}
